p: The synthesis of matrix proteins or proteinases inhibition are attempted with the application of a wide range of specific skin formulation products containing compounds such as ethanolamines, sodium lauryl sulphates, polypeptides or oligopeptides. However, the possibility of developing allergic reactions and other adverse conditions led to continuous search for natural bioactive compounds that could be applied in cosmetic formulations. As such, bioactive compounds originating from microalgae have gained much popularity of its amazing moisturizing, thickening, pigmenting, anti-ageing, skin whitening, sunscreen protection, and many other properties [ 140, 141].
